languages.text: "Скажу сразу: вряд ли ответ на этот вопрос обрадует меня или тебя. Махинации Хаоса обычно включают в себя не только многочисленные жертвы и разрушения. Претворение их планов в жизнь грозит куда более ужасающими последствиями. Одна из систем Простора уже утрачена... Император убереги нас от повторения подобной трагедии".

traits.locale_text: "Скажу сразу: вряд ли ответ на этот вопрос обрадует меня или тебя. Махинации Хаоса обычно включают в себя не только многочисленные жертвы и разрушения. Претворение их планов в жизнь грозит куда более ужасающими последствиями. Одна из систем Простора уже утрачена... Император убереги нас от повторения подобной трагедии".

languages.text: "I will be frank: the answer to this question is unlikely to please either of us. The machinations of Chaos usually go beyond solely inflicting countless deaths and destruction. Having their plans come to fruition would lead to far more terrible consequences. One of the systems in the Koronus Expanse is already lost... May the Emperor protect us from watching this tragedy play out again."
languages.original_text: "Скажу сразу: вряд ли ответ на этот вопрос обрадует меня или тебя. Махинации Хаоса обычно включают в себя не только многочисленные жертвы и разрушения. Претворение их планов в жизнь грозит куда более ужасающими последствиями. Одна из систем Простора уже утрачена... Император убереги нас от повторения подобной трагедии".

traits.locale_text: "I will be frank: the answer to this question is unlikely to please either of us. Chaos machinations usually go farther than inflicting countless deaths and destruction. Having their plans come to fruition would lead to far more terrible consequences. One of the systems in the Expanse is already lost... May the Emperor protect us from watching this tragedy play out again."

languages.text: «Seré sincero: dudo que la respuesta a esta pregunta nos agrade a ninguno de los dos. Las maquinaciones del Caos no suelen limitarse a infligir muerte y destrucción a gran escala. Si sus planes dan fruto, las consecuencias serán algo terrible. Uno de los sistemas de la Extensión de Koronus ya está perdido... que el Emperador nos proteja para que no volvamos a ver semejante tragedia».
languages.original_text: "I will be frank: the answer to this question is unlikely to please either of us. The machinations of Chaos usually go beyond solely inflicting countless deaths and destruction. Having their plans come to fruition would lead to far more terrible consequences. One of the systems in the Koronus Expanse is already lost... May the Emperor protect us from watching this tragedy play out again."

traits.locale_text: «Seré sincero: dudo que la respuesta a esta pregunta nos agrade a ninguno de los dos. Las maquinaciones del Caos no suelen limitarse a infligir muerte y destrucción a gran escala. Si sus planes dan fruto, las consecuencias serán algo terrible. Uno de los sistemas de la Extensión de Koronus ya está perdido... que el Emperador nos proteja para que no volvamos a ver semejante tragedia».

languages.text: “我可以坦率地告诉你，这个问题的答案恐怕你我都不会满意。绝大多数情况下，混沌势力的阴谋不仅仅会造成无数伤亡与破坏。一旦他们的计划得以实施，会导致更加可怕的后果。我们已经失去了科罗努斯扩区中的某个星系……愿帝皇保佑我们，不要再让我们看到这样的悲剧。”
languages.original_text: "I will be frank: the answer to this question is unlikely to please either of us. The machinations of Chaos usually go beyond solely inflicting countless deaths and destruction. Having their plans come to fruition would lead to far more terrible consequences. One of the systems in the Koronus Expanse is already lost... May the Emperor protect us from watching this tragedy play out again."

traits.locale_text: “我可以坦率地告诉你，这个问题的答案恐怕你我都不会满意。绝大多数情况下，混沌势力的阴谋不仅仅会造成无数伤亡与破坏。一旦他们的计划得以实施，会导致更加可怕的后果。我们已经失去了科罗努斯星域中的某个星系……愿帝皇保佑我们，不要再让我们看到这样的悲剧。”

languages.text: 「正直言うと、答えはどちらも満足できるものになりません。だいたい渾沌の企みは、いくつもの死を生んで破壊をもたらすだけじゃないのです。奴らの計画が実現すれば、もっと恐ろしいことになるでしょう。コロヌス・エクスパンスの星系のひとつはすでに失われている…この悲劇が再び起こらぬよう、皇帝よ、お守りください」
languages.original_text: "I will be frank: the answer to this question is unlikely to please either of us. The machinations of Chaos usually go beyond solely inflicting countless deaths and destruction. Having their plans come to fruition would lead to far more terrible consequences. One of the systems in the Koronus Expanse is already lost... May the Emperor protect us from watching this tragedy play out again."

traits.locale_text: 「正直言うと、答えはどちらも満足できるものになりません。だいたい渾沌の企みは、いくつもの死を生んで破壊をもたらすだけじゃないのです。奴らの計画が実現すれば、もっと恐ろしいことになるでしょう。コロヌス・エクスパンスの星系のひとつはすでに失われている…この悲劇が再び起こらぬよう、皇帝よ、お守りください」

languages.text: "Ganz ehrlich? Die Antwort auf diese Frage wird keinem von uns gefallen. Die Machenschaften des Chaos verursachen für gewöhnlich nicht nur Tod und Zerstörung. Sollten ihre Pläne Früchte tragen, hätte das weit schrecklichere Konsequenzen. Eines der Systeme in der Koronus-Ausdehnung ist fast schon verloren ... Möge uns der Imperator davor bewahren, diese Tragödie noch einmal durchleben zu müssen."
languages.original_text: "I will be frank: the answer to this question is unlikely to please either of us. The machinations of Chaos usually go beyond solely inflicting countless deaths and destruction. Having their plans come to fruition would lead to far more terrible consequences. One of the systems in the Koronus Expanse is already lost... May the Emperor protect us from watching this tragedy play out again."

traits.locale_text: "Ganz ehrlich? Die Antwort auf diese Frage wird keinem von uns gefallen. Die Machenschaften des Chaos verursachen für gewöhnlich nicht nur Tod und Zerstörung. Sollten ihre Pläne Früchte tragen, hätte das weit schrecklichere Konsequenzen. Eines der Systeme in der Koronus Expanse ist fast schon verloren ... Möge uns der Imperator davor bewahren, diese Tragödie noch einmal durchleben zu müssen."

languages.text: « Je vais être franc : les réponses à ces questions risquent de nous déplaire à tous les deux. Les machinations du Chaos ne se limitent généralement pas à semer la mort et la destruction. Si le culte parvenait à mener son plan à bien, les conséquences seraient considérablement plus terribles. Nous avons déjà perdu l'un des systèmes des Étendues de Koronus... Prions l'Empereur pour que cette tragédie ne se reproduise pas. »
languages.original_text: "I will be frank: the answer to this question is unlikely to please either of us. The machinations of Chaos usually go beyond solely inflicting countless deaths and destruction. Having their plans come to fruition would lead to far more terrible consequences. One of the systems in the Koronus Expanse is already lost... May the Emperor protect us from watching this tragedy play out again."

traits.locale_text: « Je vais être franc : les réponses à ces questions risquent de nous déplaire à tous les deux. Les machinations du Chaos ne se limitent généralement pas à semer la mort et la destruction. Si le culte parvenait à mener son plan à bien, les conséquences seraient considérablement plus terribles. Nous avons déjà perdu l'un des systèmes des Étendues de Koronus... Prions l'Empereur pour que cette tragédie ne se reproduise pas. »

languages.text: "Açık konuşacağım: Bu sorunun yanıtından muhtemelen ne seni ne de beni hoşnut eder. Kaos'un planları genellikle sayısız ölüme ve yıkıma sebep olmanın ötesine geçer. Bu planların meyve vermesine izin vermek, çok daha korkunç sonuçlara yol açabilir. Koronus Enginliği'ndeki sistemlerden biri kaybedildi bile. İmparator bizi böylesi bir trajediye yeniden şahit olmaktan esirgesin."
languages.original_text: "I will be frank: the answer to this question is unlikely to please either of us. The machinations of Chaos usually go beyond solely inflicting countless deaths and destruction. Having their plans come to fruition would lead to far more terrible consequences. One of the systems in the Koronus Expanse is already lost... May the Emperor protect us from watching this tragedy play out again."

traits.locale_text: "Açık konuşacağım: Bu sorunun yanıtından muhtemelen ne sen hoşnut kalırsın ne de ben. Kaos'un planları genellikle sayısız ölüme ve yıkıma sebep olmanın ötesine geçer. Bu planların meyve vermesine izin vermek çok daha korkunç sonuçlara yol açabilir. Koronus Enginliği'ndeki sistemlerden biri kaybedildi bile. İmparator bizi böylesi bir trajediye yeniden şahit olmaktan esirgesin."
